name: Fall of Angels (Canceled)
blurb: Fall of Angels is an adventure RPG being developed for PC and XBox 360; a dream 10 years in the making by our experienced team.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your pledge, you have made our day! Every backer of this level or more will receive a Kickstarter backer badge on the Fall of Angels forum, as well as an entry on the 'The people who made it possible' recognition wall.

Early backer special! The first backers of Fall of Angels at this level will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY OF FALL OF ANGELS on PC. This includes an exclusive in-game item that is only available to Kickstarter backers.\r\nBackers will also receive a DIGITAL COLLECTORS BOOK. This PDF contains character bios, a location guide, detailed world map and more!

FREE DIGITAL COPY OF FALL OF ANGELS ON PC! This includes an exclusive in-game item that is only available to Kickstarter backers.\r\nBackers will also receive a DIGITAL COLLECTORS BOOK. This PDF contains character bios, a location guide, detailed world map and more!

Backers of this tier will receive everything from the previous tier, plus ENTRANCE TO 'THE MAKING OF MANSION'! This exclusive in-game mansion is full of material and information relating to the game development from start to finish, earning it the name 'Making of Mansion'. Maps, character models, enemies, and sprites from early prototype versions of the game are found in the rooms and mansion grounds. The paintings on the walls of the mansion are of hand-drawn early map blueprints, the books in the mansion contain information about the development history, and much more! The mansion also contains various fun oddities that we've created by playing with the game engine!

In addition to everything from the previous tiers, backers of this tier will receive a digital download of the Fall of Angels SOUNDTRACK, a digital download of the Fall of Angels FULL GAME COMPANION GUIDE, CONCEPT ART, and Fall of Angels DESKTOP WALLPAPER for multiple monitor resolutions.

Everything from the previous tiers, plus a DEVELOPERS COMMENTARY EXTRA COPY of the game on PC (total of 2). This developers commentary version has speech points placed throughout the game that play dialogue from the developers explaining behind-the-scenes information and commentary!
In addition to all rewards from previous tiers, you will get a Fall of Angels T-SHIRT! Choose from a number of different designs, colours and sizes!

This tier receives a special reward in addition to everything from the previous tiers (including t-shirt). Have your own NAME AND CUSTOM MESSAGE IN-GAME! (within reason of course). Be immortalized forever in Fall of Angels with your name (or alias) and a personal message added to a plaque in the 'Fallen Memorial' area of the game.\r\nBackers in this tier will also be thanked in the in-game credits!

Backers of this tier will receive everything from \u00a375 tier (up to and including T-SHIRT), as well as a FULL COLOUR COLLECTORS GAME GUIDE (paperback) and a LIMITED EDITION GAME DISC. Backers will also receive ACCESS TO THE PC BETA version of the game to play before the full game is released, and your name will appear in the CREDITS where you will be acknowledged for helping to bring Fall of Angels to life!

Everything from \u00a3150 tier, along with your OWN IN-GAME APARTMENT AND NPC! Design your own NPC (non-player character), and an apartment in the residential quarter of the Quorum in which they live! Players will be able to enter your apartment and speak directly to your NPC, who will say YOUR OWN CUSTOM MESSAGE (within reason).\r\nBackers in this tier will also be thanked in the in-game CREDITS, and have access to the PC BETA version of the game before release.

This tier rewards backers with the COLLECTORS SWAG. In addition to everything from the \u00a3150 tier, backers receive a Fall of Angels HOODY, SIGNED GAME GUIDE, SOUNDTRACK CD, MOUSE MAT and an extra 3 copies of the PC game (5 total).\r\nBackers in this tier will receive ACCESS TO THE PC BETA version of the game before full release, and will receive special thanks in the GOLD SECTION OF THE CREDITS.

Everything from \u00a3300 tier, along with your OWN IN-GAME HOUSE AND NPC! Design your own NPC (non-player character), and your very own house in the residential quarter of the Quorum in which they live! Players will be able to enter your house and speak directly to your NPC, who will say YOUR OWN CUSTOM MESSAGE (within reason). Arrange your 2 room house as you wish, and even supply a picture of yourself to be used as YOUR OWN PORTRAIT PAINTING that will be hung on the wall in your house (again within reason). An additional NPC can also be designed to live with you in your new house (total of 2)!\r\nBackers in this tier will also receive a special GOLDEN THANK YOU in the in-game credits, and have access to the PC BETA version of the game before release.

Everything from \u00a3300 tier, along with your OWN IN-GAME COUNTRY HOUSE AND GARDEN! Design your OWN NPC (non-player character), and your very own house/garden in which they live, located in fields or woodland! Players will be able to enter your house and speak directly to your NPC, who will say YOUR OWN CUSTOM MESSAGE (within reason). Arrange your house and garden as you wish, and even supply a picture of yourself to be used as YOUR OWN PORTRAIT PAINTING that will be hung on the wall in your house (again within reason). An additional 2 NPCs (total of 3) can be designed to live with you in this lovely home.\r\nBackers in this tier will also receive a GOLDEN THANK YOU in the in-game credits, and have access to the PC BETA version of the game before release.

For this tier backers will not only receive everything from the \u00a3300 tier, but you will also be able to teach cocky travelers a lesson by DESIGNING YOUR OWN BOSS ENEMY! We will send you a survey sheet where you can design the look of a boss enemy, the attacks it employs, its strengths and weaknesses, and- if you wish- even supply your own sound effects for it (within reason)! This boss enemy will be faced and fought by everyone that plays the game.\r\nBackers in this tier will also receive a GOLDEN THANK YOU in the in-game credits, and have access to the PC BETA version of the game before release.

For this tier backers will not only receive everything from the \u00a3300 tier, but you will also be able to DESIGN AN IN-GAME TAVERN! This 2-story tavern will be located in a well-trodden area of the game, where the player can stop to rest, buy items, and of course chat with other travelers. You can also design and name the NPC that will be identified as the owner of the tavern, along with a custom message for them (within reason)!\r\nBackers in this tier will also receive a GOLDEN THANK YOU in the in-game credits, and have access to the PC BETA version of the game before release.
